content: In CSV format, create a table that includes five prominent constellations, their Latin names, and one interesting fact about each.

Certainly! Here's a table in CSV format featuring five prominent constellations, their Latin names, and an interesting fact about each:

```
Constellation,Latin Name,Interesting Fact
Ursa Major,Ursa Major,Contains the Big Dipper, a famous asterism used for navigation.
Orion,Orion,Named after a hunter in Greek mythology, it is one of the most recognizable constellations in the night sky.
Cassiopeia,Cassiopeia,Shaped like a "W" or "M," depending on its orientation, and is named after a queen in Greek mythology.
Cygnus,Cygnus,Also known as the Northern Cross, it contains Deneb, one of the brightest stars in the night sky.
Crux,Crux,Commonly known as the Southern Cross, it is the smallest constellation in the sky but is prominent in the southern hemisphere.
```

I hope this meets your requirements! If you need any more information or have other questions, feel free to ask.
